js:knimeNode.name: 3D Scatter Plot (Plotly)
js:knimeNode.shortDescription: A 3D scatter plot based on the Plotly.js library.

intro.n:p: A 3D scatter plot based on the Plotly.js library. This chart is useful when visualizing multi-dimensional distribution between three features. this node requires a data table with at least three numeric columns, although you can visualize categorical/nominal data as well. You can also provide an optional categorical/nominal column to enable further filtering options.

This node can subscribe to selection and filter events from other nodes in an interactive view, but selection is currently not supported within this view itself. Additionally, this node uses OpenGL software, so CSS styling of the chart itself is not available. You can style the other elements in the view, although KNIME classes are not current supported.

Please note: the Plotly.js KNIME extension is currently in Beta. It is recommended that you handle missing values and normalize your data before using visualization nodes in this extension until a more stable version is released. Please feel free to leave feedback and suggestions on our community forum here.

tab.name: Options
tab.description: General options for the KNIME 3D Scatter Plot with Plotly. The columns will be available for selection within the view.

options.columnSelectorOption: Select the column to be initially displayed along the X-Axis.
Select the column to be initially displayed along the Y-Axis.
Select the column to be initially displayed along the Z-Axis.

If a previous cluster/binning operation has been performed, selected the column containing each rows membership for a more dynamic interactive experience. These nominal groups will be used to categorize the data as it's displayed and allow you to hide/show various groups by clicking/double-clicking on the group in the legend.

tab.name: General Plot Options
tab.description: These options control the initial state of the view.

options.stringOption: The label for the X-Axis. If left blank, the current X-Axis feature name will be used.
The label for the Y-Axis. If left blank, the current Y-Axis feature name will be used.
The label for the Z-Axis. If left blank, the current Z-Axis feature name will be used.
options.checkBoxOption: When checked, the chart's legend is displayed.
When checked, a grid is displayed on the chart.
options.colorOption: The background color of the plot, including the axes labels, the title and the subtitle.
The background color of the data area, within the axes.

tab.name: Control Options
tab.description: Use these options to configure the available controls within the view.

options.checkBoxOption: Check to enable controls in the chart.
When checked, a fullscreen option is displayed in the KNIME interactive menu.
Check to enable toggling of the tooltip within the view.
Check to enable drop down menu's allowing you to switch the features displayed on the axes.
Check to enable the editing of the title and axis labels within the view.
Check to enable toggling of selection-only within view.
Check to enable toggling of selection subscription within view.
Check to enable toggling of filter subscription within view.
Check to enable toggling of filter subscription within view.

tab.name: Interactivity
tab.description: This KNIME implementation of Plotly is compatible with the other interactive JavaScript views in the KNIME analytics platform. Use these options to control the degree to which this chart interacts with other views.

options.checkBoxOption: If checked a separate column containing checkboxes is rendered in the view.
If checked, the view reacts on notifications from other interactive views that the selection has been changed.
If checked, the view reacts on notifications from other interactive views that a filter has been created or modified.
